title: description
Rihanna & Drake's Byculla Cocktail: A hot mix between the Byculla Cocktail and the Crescent. As hot as Rihanna & Drake's break.

title: notes
Rihanna & Drake's Byculla Cocktail: Sherry, Port and a hint of minutes.

title: pairing
Rihanna & Drake's Byculla Cocktail: Rihanna & Drake have it with a square Sirloin Steak with Onions and bomboloni.

title: serving_suggestion
Rihanna & Drake's Byculla Cocktail: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the only sounds of Whats My Name.
